definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: From which dynasty was the blue---flower porcelain plate in the Hall of Happiness and Longevity left?
sentences.chinese: 頤和園樂壽堂內的青花大磁盤是哪個朝代的遺物？
基於分區或磁盤映像的部署。

sentences.english: It seems likely that disks are assembled and based at Pine Gap.
sentences.chinese: 看起來似乎磁盤組裝和基礎松樹峽口。

sentences.english: The data on the disks is not compromised, but the disks cannot be accessed.
sentences.chinese: 雖然磁盤上的數據沒有損失，但是無法訪問該磁盤。

sentences.english: The data on the disks is not compromised, but the disks cannot be accessed.
sentences.chinese: 雖然磁盤上的數據沒有損失，但是無法訪問該磁盤。

sentences.english: Break disk mirrors into active and offline sides.
sentences.chinese: 將磁盤鏡像分爲活動方和脫機方。

sentences.english: The emergency repair diskette was saved successfully.
sentences.chinese: 急修復磁盤已成功保存了。

sentences.english: A disk drive system and method capable of dynamically allocating data is provided.
sentences.chinese: 提供了能夠動態分配數據的磁盤驅動器系統和方法。

sentences.english: Bookmarks have changed on disk and are being reloaded.
sentences.chinese: 已經在磁盤上更改了書籤，正在被重新裝入。

sentences.english: Open Disk Utility. Create a new image with these options.
sentences.chinese: 打開磁盤工具，創建一個新鏡像，參數如下。

sentences.english: The swap file is used to quickly and easily swap tiles out to disk and back in.
sentences.chinese: 交換文件使得以平鋪方式換出換入磁盤非常方便快捷。

sentences.english: Perform a filesystem check on the disk that contains the? bad mount point.
sentences.chinese: 對包含壞安裝點的磁盤進行文件系統檢查。

sentences.english: This slows down disk-seeking speed rather significantly.
sentences.chinese: 這會相當大地減慢磁盤查找速度。

sentences.english: There are no compression properties available for it within DriveSpace.
sentences.chinese: “磁盤空間管理”中無可用的壓縮屬性。

sentences.english: Select rescan to update the disk usage details.
sentences.chinese: 選擇重新掃描可以更新磁盤使用細節。

sentences.english: Please verify that the diskette with the file is in the correct drive.
sentences.chinese: 請檢查包含該文件的磁盤是否在正確的驅動器上。

definition: to click (using a mouse or other pointing device)
compact disc/CD or DVD/CD ROM/CL:片[pian4],張|张[zhang1]
mojibake (nonsense characters displayed when software fails to render text according to its intended character encoding)
